testcase.name: No validation error when the requested loan amount is the minimum allowed Req[11,12]
No validation error when the requested loan amount is the maximum allowed Req[11,12]
Validation service throws an error when the requested amount is more that 15000 Req[10,11,12]
Validation service throws an error when the requested amount is less that 1000 Req[10,11,12]
Validation service throws an error when the requested amount contains alphabet characters Req[10,11,12]
Validation service throws an error when the requested amount is not rounded to the nearest hundred Req[10,11,12]
